attributes.action: Promote British values and symbols - keep Britannia on the 50 pence piece
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon. Will you retain this symbol of the British people so proudly presented on the Bank of Englands coinage since 1672.?

Would the Prime Minister agree it is in the interests of Britain to do so.?

When you wrap yourself in the British flag are you not concealing a bin full of British symbols trashed in order to paint a picture of progress or modernisation?

We the undersigned petition you to keep Britannia on the 50 pence piece.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
